channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken glass from a bus stop, many large pieces of glass lying on the ground, very unsafe, 7th November
item.description:
Stanwick Gardens bus stop on Wibyridge Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Two very large holes in pavement that our car tyres bang down into when we pull on to our drive., 7th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Fly tipping, 7th November
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping, 7th November

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 7th November
